EGX Rezzed

12-14 March 2015, London

26 feb. 2015

We are going to the EGX Rezzed (12-14 March, 2015) in London!

The game will be (almost-)fully playable. Come and try to get the best score!


As of today, Steredenn is also available on pre-order for Steam (PC/Mac/Linux). As soon as the beta is ready, we will give an access to all the buyers. What’s best? The game is also on sale for a limited time and only for the pre-orders.

Pre-ordering the game is the best way to support us! :)

Thanks.

26 february. 2015
